act.author: 20th Century Fox
act.alt_img: Movie Cover: the lower left corner is black and contains information about the movie, the rest is populated by an exploding skyscraper and Bruce Willis' face
act.descr: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

act.author: Ilya Naishuller
act.alt_img: Movie Cover: POV a person holding two uns jumping upside down out of an airplane onto a city
act.descr: Filmed out of the POV of the protagonist Henry, who is resurrected from death with no memory, and he must save his wife from a telekinetic warlord with a plan to bio-engineer soldiers.

act.author: Elizabeth Banks
act.descr: An oddball group of cops, criminals, tourists and teens converge on a Georgia forest where a huge black bear goes on a murderous rampage after unintentionally ingesting cocaine.

act.author: Denis Villeneuve
act.descr: “Dune” tells the story of Paul Atreides, a gifted young man born into a great destiny, who must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his people.

act.author: Aaron Nee & Adam Nee
act.descr: After being kidnapped by a villainous treasure hunter, a successful romance novelist is forced to team up with her cover model as they are swept into a cutthroat jungle adventure that proves stranger than fiction.

act.author: Dean DeBlois & Chris Sanders
act.alt_img: Movie Cover: How to Train Your Dragon
act.descr: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

act.author: Colin Trevorrow
act.descr: With Earth once again dominated by prehistoric predators, two generations of heroes must unite for a globe-spanning adventure to shape the destiny of humans and dinosaurs.

act.author: Andrew Niccol
act.descr: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about.

act.author: Phillip Noyce
act.descr: In a seemingly perfect community without war, pain, suffering, differences, or choices, a young boy is chosen to learn from an elderly man about the true pain and pleasure of the 'real' world.

crime.author: Chad Stahelski
crime.descr: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

crime.author: Akiva Goldsman & Todd Graff
crime.descr: In Manhattan in the summer of 1979, a young man is arrested for a shocking crime, and an unlikely investigator must solve the mystery behind it before the true criminal strikes again.

crime.author: Louis Leterrier
crime.descr: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes.

crime.author: Martin Scorsese
crime.alt_img: Movie Cover: Killers of the Flower Moon
crime.descr: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

crime.author: David E. Kelley
crime.descr: wo churchgoing couples enjoy small town family life in Texas - until somebody picks up an axe.

crime.author: Guy Ritchie
crime.descr: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

fantasy.author: Genndy Tartakovsky
fantasy.descr: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.

fantasy.author: Greg Tiernan & Conrad Vernon
fantasy.descr: The eccentrically macabre family moves to a bland suburb where Wednesday Addams' friendship with the daughter of a hostile and conformist local reality show host exacerbates conflict between the families.

fantasy.author: Justin Benson & Aaron Moorhead
fantasy.descr: As kids, they escaped a UFO death cult. Now, two adult brothers seek answers after an old videotape surfaces and brings them back to where they began.

fantasy.author: Christian Rivers
fantasy.descr: In a post-apocalyptic world where cities ride on wheels and consume each other to survive, two people meet in London and try to stop a conspiracy.

fantasy.img_caption: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
fantasy.author: Chris Columbus
fantasy.alt_img: Movie Cover: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
fantasy.descr: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

fantasy.author: Jon Watts
fantasy.alt_img: Movie Cover: Spider-Man: No Way Home
fantasy.descr: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

horror.author: Matt Bettinelli-Olpin & Tyler Gillett
horror.descr: In the next installment, the survivors of the Ghostface killings leave Woodsboro behind and start a fresh chapter in New York City.

horror.author: Parker Finn
horror.descr: After witnessing a bizarre, traumatic incident involving a patient, a psychiatrist becomes increasingly convinced she is being threatened by an uncanny entity.

horror.author: David Gordon Green
horror.descr: The saga of Michael Myers and Laurie Strode comes to a spine-chilling climax in the final installment of this trilogy.

horror.author: Craig Wallace
horror.descr: Kate (Lora Burke) and her daughter Beth live alone in an isolated farmhouse in the woods, but when Kate slowly begins to suspect that something sinister is happening, her motherly instincts are put to the test.

horror.author: James Wan
horror.descr: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

horror.author: Adrian Grunberg
horror.descr: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

horror.author: Leigh Janiak
horror.alt_img: Movie Cover: Fear Street: Part One - 1994
horror.descr: A circle of teenage friends accidentally encounter the ancient evil responsible for a series of brutal murders that have plagued their town for over 300 years. Welcome to Shadyside.

romance.author: Ol Parker
romance.descr: A divorced couple teams up and travels to Bali to stop their daughter from making the same mistake they think they made 25 years ago.

romance.author: Jason Moore
romance.descr: Darcy and Tom gather their families for the ultimate destination wedding but when the entire wedding party is taken hostage the bride and groom must save their loved ones--if they don't kill each other first.

romance.author: David O. Russell
romance.descr: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

romance.author: Robert Zemeckis
romance.descr: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

romance.author: Jake Kasdan
romance.descr: A lazy, incompetent middle school teacher who hates her job, her students, and her co-workers is forced to return to teaching to make enough money for breast implants after her wealthy fiancé dumps her.

romance.author: Kenneth Branagh
romance.descr: When her father unexpectedly dies, young Ella finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and her scheming stepsisters. Never one to give up hope, Ella's fortunes begin to change after meeting a dashing stranger.
